## Schema

### Required

- `identifier` (String) BGP network

    |  Format  |  Description  |
    |----------|---------------|
    |  ipv6net  |  Aggregate network  |

### Optional

- `path_limit` (String) AS-path hopcount limit

    |  Format  |  Description  |
    |----------|---------------|
    |  u32:0-255  |  AS path hop count limit  |
- `route_map` (String) Specify route-map name to use

    |  Format  |  Description  |
    |----------|---------------|
    |  txt  |  Route map name  |
